title: Monday Post Show (8-9-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (8-9-21)
description:
We get an update about Lunchbox’s Jury Duty and if he will be chosen yet. Bobby is trying to decide whether to start Outerbanks on Netflix. We all share pet peeves we don’t like about each other. Raymundo reveals one about Bobby that changes his perspective on something he never thought about. Scuba Steve reveals his pet peeves about everyone on the show. Mike D also shares his Top 3 moments from Bobby’s bachelor party.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
